insert.isNotEmpty:
INSERT INTO $boardId$ ( ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 ) VALUES ( #id# , #grp# , #idx# , #isSecret# , #isNotice# , #isHtml# , #category# , #title# , #content# , #password# , #ext01# , #ext02# , #ext03# , #ext04# , #ext05# , #ext06# , #ext07# , #ext08# , #ext09# , #ext10# , #ext11# , #ext12# , #ext13# , #ext14# , #ext15# , #ext16# , #ext17# , #ext18# , #ext19# , #ext20# , #date01# , #date02# , #hit# , #writer# , #mbrId# , #mbrIp#
, NOW()
, #created#
, NOW()
, #modified#
, 1 , #isdel# , #tmp1# , #tmp2# , #tmp3# , #tmp4# , #tmp5# )

update.isNotEmpty:
UPDATE $boardId$
SET IS_SECRET=#isSecret# , IS_NOTICE=#isNotice# , IS_HTML=#isHtml# , CATEGORY=#category# , TITLE=#title# , CONTENT=#content# , EXT01=#ext01# , EXT02=#ext02# , EXT03=#ext03# , EXT04=#ext04# , EXT05=#ext05# , EXT06=#ext06# , EXT07=#ext07# , EXT08=#ext08# , EXT09=#ext09# , EXT10=#ext10# , EXT11=#ext11# , EXT12=#ext12# , EXT13=#ext13# , EXT14=#ext14# , EXT15=#ext15# , EXT16=#ext16# , EXT17=#ext17# , EXT18=#ext18# , EXT19=#ext19# , EXT20=#ext20# , DATE01=#date01# , DATE02=#date02# , HIT=#hit# , WRITER=#writer#
, CREATED=#created#
, MODIFIED=NOW() , ISDEL=#isdel# , TMP1=#tmp1# , TMP2=#tmp2# , TMP3=#tmp3# , TMP4=#tmp4# , TMP5=#tmp5# WHERE ID=#id#
SET IS_SECRET=#isSecret# , IS_NOTICE=#isNotice# , IS_HTML=#isHtml# , CATEGORY=#category# , TITLE=#title# , CONTENT=#content# , EXT01=#ext01# , EXT02=#ext02# , EXT03=#ext03# , EXT04=#ext04# , EXT05=#ext05# , EXT06=#ext06# , EXT07=#ext07# , EXT08=#ext08# , EXT09=#ext09# , EXT10=#ext10# , EXT11=#ext11# , EXT12=#ext12# , EXT13=#ext13# , EXT14=#ext14# , EXT15=#ext15# , EXT16=#ext16# , EXT17=#ext17# , EXT18=#ext18# , EXT19=#ext19# , EXT20=#ext20# , DATE01=#date01# , DATE02=#date02# , HIT=#hit#
, CREATED=#created#
, MODIFIED=NOW() , ISDEL=#isdel# , TMP3=#tmp3# , TMP4=#tmp4# , TMP5=#tmp5# WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

UPDATE $boardId$
SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE ID=#id#
SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE TMP1=#tmp1# AND TMP2=#id#

isNotEmpty.isEqual:
DELETE FROM $boardId$
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2=#tmp2#
WHERE GRP=#grp#
WHERE IDX LIKE CONCAT(#idx#,'_%')

UPDATE $boardId$ SET ISDEL = 1
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

update.isNotEmpty:
UPDATE $boardId$ SET ISDEL = '0'
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

select.isNotEmpty:
SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , IF(WRITER = '', '익명', WRITER) AS WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 FROM $boardId$ WHERE 1=1
ID=#id#
ORDER BY CREATED DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT
, IF(a.WRITER = '', b.MBR_NM, a.WRITER) AS WRITER
, IF(a.WRITER = '', '익명', a.WRITER) AS WRITER
, a.MBR_ID , a.MBR_IP , a.CREATED , a.MODIFIED , a.ACTIVE , a.ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5
FROM $boardId$ a, JNITCMSMBR b WHERE ID=#id# AND b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
FROM $boardId$ a WHERE ID=#id#

SELECT a.* FROM (
SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , a.ID , a.GRP , a.IDX , a.IS_SECRET , a.IS_NOTICE , a.IS_HTML , a.CATEGORY , a.TITLE
a.CONTENT
, a.PASSWORD , a.EXT01 , a.EXT02 , a.EXT03 , a.EXT04 , a.EXT05 , a.EXT06 , a.EXT07 , a.EXT08 , a.EXT09 , a.EXT10 , a.EXT11 , a.EXT12 , a.EXT13 , a.EXT14 , a.EXT15 , a.EXT16 , a.EXT17 , a.EXT18 , a.EXT19 , a.EXT20 , a.DATE01 , a.DATE02 , a.HIT , IF(a.WRITER = '', b.MBR_NM, a.WRITER) AS WRITER , a.MBR_ID , a.MBR_IP , a.CREATED , a.MODIFIED , a.ACTIVE , a.ISDEL , a.TMP1 , a.TMP2 , a.TMP3 , a.TMP4 , a.TMP5
, IFNULL(c.FILE_ID,'') AS FILE_ID , IFNULL(c.FILE_URL,'') AS FILE_URL , IFNULL(c.FILE_PATH,'') AS FILE_PATH , IFNULL(c.FILE_NM,'') AS FILE_NM , IFNULL(c.FILE_ONM,'') AS FILE_ONM , IFNULL(c.ISMAIN,'') AS ISMAIN , IFNULL(c.EXT01,'') AS FILE_EXT01 , IFNULL(c.EXT01,'') AS FILE_EXT02
, IFNULL(d.MBR_ID,"") AS M_MBR_ID , IFNULL(d.MBR_NM,"") AS M_MBR_NM , IFNULL(d.TEL,"") AS M_TEL , IFNULL(d.MOBILE,"") AS M_MOBILE , IFNULL(d.EMAIL,"") AS M_EMAIL
, IFNULL(e.BOARD_GROUP,"") AS BOARD_GROUP
FROM $boardId$ AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR AS b on b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN jnitboardfile AS c
ON a.ID = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = '$boardId$'
ON a.TMP2 = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = a.TMP1
AND c.ISMAIN = 1 AND c.ISDEL = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR AS d on d.MBR_ID=a.EXT05
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITBOARDINFO AS e on e.BOARD_ID=a.TMP1
WHERE 1=1
BOARD_GROUP = #searchSite#
( DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') OR (DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE02,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')) )
(DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m') OR (DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE02,'%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m')) )
a.ISDEL != 1 AND a.CREATED <= NOW()
(IDX IS NULL OR IDX = '')
(a.GRP = #grp# AND IDX IS NOT NULL AND IDX != '')
a.CATEGORY = #searchCategory#
a.CATEGORY = #selectList[]#
a.IDX IS NULL
$Query$
(a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') OR a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%'))
a.WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.IS_NOTICE = 1
a.IS_NOTICE = 0
a.MBR_ID = #myBoardList#
a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT01 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT02 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT03 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT04 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT05 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT06 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT07 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT08 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT09 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT10 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT11 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT12 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT13 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT14 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT15 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT16 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT17 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT18 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT19 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT20 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.CREATED BETWEEN #createdStartDate# AND #createdEndDate#
(IDX=#idx# OR IDX LIKE CONCAT(#idx#,'_%') )
(ID=#id# OR GRP=#id# )
GROUP BY a.ID
ORDER BY
a.HIT DESC,
a.DATE01 ASC,
a.GRP DESC, a.IDX ASC
a.DATE01 ASC
a.TMP3 DESC, a.CREATED DESC
a.CREATED ASC
limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
) a ORDER BY
a.HIT DESC,
CREATED DESC, TMP3 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM $boardId$ AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR AS b on b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN jnitboardfile AS c
ON a.ID = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = '$boardId$'
ON a.TMP2 = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = a.TMP1
AND c.ISMAIN = 1 AND c.ISDEL = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITBOARDINFO AS e on e.BOARD_ID=a.TMP1
WHERE 1=1
BOARD_GROUP = #searchSite#
( DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') OR (DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE02,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT (#searchDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')) )
(DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m') OR (DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE01,'%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT (a.DATE02,'%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT (#searchMonth#,'%Y-%m')) )
a.ISDEL != 1 AND a.CREATED <= NOW()
(IDX IS NULL OR IDX = '')
(a.GRP = #grp# AND IDX IS NOT NULL AND IDX != '')
a.CATEGORY = #searchCategory#
a.CATEGORY = #selectList[]#
a.IDX IS NULL
$Query$
(a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') OR a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') )
a.WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.IS_NOTICE = 1
a.IS_NOTICE = 0
a.MBR_ID = #myBoardList#
a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT01 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT02 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT03 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT04 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT05 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT06 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT07 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT08 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT09 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT10 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT11 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT12 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT13 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT14 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT15 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT16 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT17 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT18 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT19 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.EXT20 LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
a.CREATED BETWEEN #createdStartDate# AND #createdEndDate#
(IDX=#idx# OR IDX LIKE CONCAT(#idx#,'_%') )
(ID=#id# OR GRP=#id# )

SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , CASE WHEN WRITER = '' THEN '익명' ELSE WRITER END AS WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 FROM $boardId$ WHERE 1=1 AND IS_NOTICE = 0
ISDEL != 1 AND IS_SECRET = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT (CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d') <= NOW()
GRP > #searchKeyword# AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC
GRP < #searchKeyword# AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC
GRP = #searchKeyword# ORDER BY GRP DESC, IDX
CREATED > (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED ASC
CREATED < (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED DESC
CREATED = (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL
CREATED < (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED DESC
CREATED > (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED ASC
CREATED = (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL
LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.IDX,1,LENGTH(A.IDX)-1), CHAR(ASCII(RIGHT(A.IDX,1))+1)) AS IDX FROM (SELECT GRP, IDX, LEFT(IDX, LENGTH(#idx#)) AS GID FROM $boardId$ WHERE GRP = #grp# AND LENGTH(IDX) = LENGTH(#idx#) + 1 ORDER BY IDX DESC) AS A WHERE A.GID = #idx# ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 0,1
